DEFAULT.project_sabotaged:
YOU STOPPED THE RESEARCH PROJECT
FROM REPLACING YOU.
DEFAULT.project_completed:
THE RESEARCHERS FINISHED THEIR
PROJECT, REPLACING YOU.
DEFAULT.character_techie_desc: THE TECHNICIAN WILL FIX THINGS YOU SABOTAGE.
DEFAULT.character_goon_desc: THE LAB WORKER ACTIVELY WORKS ON THE PROJECT.
DEFAULT.character_security_desc: THE GUARD PATROLS THE LAB AND WILL SPOT YOUR ACTIONS.
DEFAULT.poi_generic_desc_notenoughpower: YOU DO NOT HAVE SUFFICIENT POWER TO SABOTAGE.
DEFAULT.poi_computer_desc_hackable: THIS COMPUTER IS CURRENTLY WORKING CORRECTLY.
DEFAULT.poi_computer_desc_hacked: YOU HAVE CORRUPTED THIS COMPUTER'S DATA.
DEFAULT.poi_computer_desc_being_fixed: THIS COMPUTER IS CURRENTLY BEING REPAIRED.
DEFAULT.poi_computer_desc_inuse: A WORKER IS CURRENTLY USING THIS COMPUTER.
DEFAULT.poi_bookcase_desc_being_fixed: THIS PRINTER IS BEING CURRENTLY BEING FIXED.
DEFAULT.poi_bookcase_desc_inuse: A WORKER IS CURRENTLY PRINTING DOCUMENTS.
DEFAULT.poi_server_desc_hackable: THE SERVER IS CURRENTLY REPORTING A GOOD CONNECTION.
DEFAULT.poi_server_desc_hacked: YOU HAVE DISCONNECTED THE SERVER FROM THE NETWORK.
DEFAULT.poi_server_desc_inuse: A WORKER IS CURRENTLY USING THIS SERVER.
DEFAULT.poi_toilet_desc_hackable: THE TOILET IS CURRENTLY OPERATING AS EXPECTED.
DEFAULT.poi_toilet_desc_hacked: YOU HAVE SABOTAGED THE TOILET SYSTEM.
DEFAULT.poi_toilet_desc_being_fixed: THE TOILET SYSTEM IS BEING REPAIRED.
DEFAULT.poi_toilet_desc_inuse: A WORKER IS CURRENTLY USING THIS TOILET.
DEFAULT.poi_shower_desc_hackable: THE SHOWER IS CURRENTLY A NICE WARM TEMPERATURE.
DEFAULT.poi_shower_desc_being_fixed: THE SHOWER TEMPERATURE IS BEING RESTORED.
DEFAULT.poi_shower_desc_inuse: A WORKER IS CURRENTLY HAVING A SHOWER.
DEFAULT.poi_sink_desc_hackable: THE SINK IS CURRENTLY OPERATING AS NORMAL.
DEFAULT.poi_sink_desc_hacked: YOU HAVE OVERFLOWED THE SINK BASIN.
DEFAULT.poi_sink_desc_being_fixed: THE SINK IS CURRENTLY BEING DRAINED.
DEFAULT.poi_sink_desc_inuse: A WORKER IS CURRENTLY OPERATING THIS SINK.
DEFAULT.poi_fridge_desc_hackable: THE FRIDGE IS CURRENTLY COOL AND OPERATIONAL.
DEFAULT.poi_fridge_desc_hacked: YOU HAVE OVERHEATED THE FRIDGE AND RUINED FOOD.

DEFAULT.poi_fridge_desc_inuse: A WORKER IS CURRENTLY BROWSING THIS FRIDGE.
DEFAULT.poi_cooker_desc_hackable: THE GAS IS CURRENTLY FLOWING AS NORMAL.
DEFAULT.poi_cooker_desc_hacked: YOU HAVE SABOTAGED THE GAS SUPPLY.
DEFAULT.poi_cooker_desc_being_fixed: THE GAS SUPPLY IS BEING RECONNECTED.
DEFAULT.poi_cooker_desc_inuse: A WORKER IS CURRENTLY USING THIS COOKER.

FRENCH.project_sabotaged:
VOUS AVEZ ARRETE LE PROJET DE
RECHERCHE POUR VOUS REMPLACER.
FRENCH.project_completed:
LES CHERCHEURS ONT FINI LEUR
PROJET POUR VOUS REMPLACER.
FRENCH.character_techie_desc: LE TECHNICIEN FIXERA DES CHOSES QUE VOUS SABOTERA.
FRENCH.character_security_desc: LES GARDES DE LA GARDE ET DEPOTERONT VOS ACTIONS.
FRENCH.poi_generic_desc_notenoughpower: VOUS N'AVEZ PAS DE POUVOIR SUFFISANT AU SABOTAGE.
FRENCH.poi_door_desc_being_fixed: CETTE PORTE EST EN COURS DE REOUVERTURE
FRENCH.poi_computer_desc_hacked: VOUS AVEZ CORROMPU LES DONNEES DE CET ORDINATEUR.
FRENCH.poi_computer_desc_being_fixed: CET ORDINATEUR EST EN TRAIN D'ETRE REPARE.
FRENCH.poi_computer_desc_inuse: UN TRAVAILLEUR UTILISE ACTUELLEMENT CET ORDINATEUR.
FRENCH.poi_bookcase_desc_being_fixed: CETTE IMPRIMANTE EST EN COURS DE FIXATION.
FRENCH.poi_bookcase_desc_inuse: UN TRAVAILLEUR IMPRESSE ACTUELLEMENT DES DOCUMENTS.
FRENCH.poi_server_desc_hackable: LE SERVEUR A UNE BONNE CONNEXION.
FRENCH.poi_server_desc_hacked: VOUS AVEZ DECONNECTE LE SERVEUR DU RESEAU.
FRENCH.poi_server_desc_inuse: UN TRAVAILLEUR UTILISE ACTUELLEMENT CE SERVEUR.
FRENCH.poi_toilet_desc_hacked: VOUS AVEZ SABOTE LE SYSTEME DE TOILETTES.
FRENCH.poi_toilet_desc_being_fixed: LE SYSTEME DE TOILETTES EN COURS DE REPARATION.
FRENCH.poi_toilet_desc_inuse: UN TRAVAILLEUR UTILISE ACTUELLEMENT CETTE TOILETTE.
FRENCH.poi_shower_desc_being_fixed: RESTAURATION DE LA TEMPERATURE DE LA DOUCHE.
FRENCH.poi_shower_desc_inuse: UN TRAVAILLEUR A ACTUELLEMENT UNE DOUCHE.
FRENCH.poi_sink_desc_hacked: VOUS AVEZ DEBORDE LE BASSIN DE L'EVIER.
FRENCH.poi_sink_desc_being_fixed: L’EVIER EST ACTUELLEMENT EN COURS DE DRAINAGE.
FRENCH.poi_sink_desc_inuse: UN TRAVAILLEUR UTILISE ACTUELLEMENT CET EVIER.
FRENCH.poi_fridge_desc_hackable: LE FRIGO EST ACTUELLEMENT COOL ET OPERATIONNEL.
FRENCH.poi_fridge_desc_hacked: SURCHAUFFE DU FRIGO ET DE LA RUINE.
FRENCH.poi_fridge_desc_inuse: UN TRAVAILLEUR VOIT ACTUELLEMENT CE REFRIGERATEUR.
FRENCH.poi_cooker_desc_hacked: VOUS AVEZ SACOTE L’ALIMENTATION EN GAZ.
FRENCH.poi_cooker_desc_inuse: UN TRAVAILLEUR UTILISE ACTUELLEMENT CE CUISEUR.

SPANISH.project_sabotaged:
DETESTE EL PROYECTO DE INVESTIGACION
PARA REEMPLAZARLO.
SPANISH.project_completed:
LOS INVESTIGADORES TERMINARON SU
PROYECTO PARA REEMPLAZARLE.
SPANISH.character_techie_desc: EL TECNICO FIJARA LAS COSAS QUE HACES SABOTADO.
SPANISH.character_goon_desc: TRABAJADORA TRABAJA ACTIVAMENTE EN EL PROYECTO.
SPANISH.character_security_desc: GUARD PATROLS LAB Y PODRA SUS ACCIONES.
SPANISH.poi_generic_desc_notenoughpower: NO TIENES UN PODER SUFICIENTE PARA EL SABOTAJE.
SPANISH.poi_computer_desc_hacked: USTED HA CORRUPTADO LOS DATOS DE ESTA COMPUTADORA.
SPANISH.poi_computer_desc_being_fixed: ESTA COMPUTADORA SE ESTÁ REPARANDO ACTUALMENTE.
SPANISH.poi_bookcase_desc_being_fixed: ESTA IMPRESORA SE ESTA CORREGIENDO ACTUALMENTE.
SPANISH.poi_bookcase_desc_inuse: UN TRABAJADOR ES IMPRESION ACTUAL DE DOCUMENTOS.
SPANISH.poi_server_desc_hackable: EL SERVIDOR ESTA REPORTANDO UNA BUENA CONEXION.
SPANISH.poi_server_desc_hacked: USTED HA DESCONECTADO EL SERVIDOR DE LA RED.
SPANISH.poi_toilet_desc_hackable: EL INODORO ACTUALMENTE FUNCIONA COMO SE ESPERA.
SPANISH.poi_toilet_desc_hacked: HAS SALVADO EL SISTEMA DE ASEO.
SPANISH.poi_toilet_desc_being_fixed: EL SISTEMA DE INODORO SE ESTA REPARANDO.
SPANISH.poi_toilet_desc_inuse: TRABAJADOR ESTA UTILIZANDO ACTUALMENTE ESTE TOILET.
SPANISH.poi_shower_desc_being_fixed: LA TEMPERATURA DE LA DUCHA ESTA RESTAURANDO.
SPANISH.poi_shower_desc_inuse: UN TRABAJADOR ESTA TENIENDO UNA DUCHA.
SPANISH.poi_sink_desc_hackable: EL SINK ESTA ACTUALMENTE OPERANDO COMO NORMAL.
SPANISH.poi_sink_desc_hacked: HAS SUPERADO LA CUENCA DEL SUMIDERO.
SPANISH.poi_sink_desc_being_fixed: EL SUMIDERO ESTA SIENDO DRENADO ACTUALMENTE.
SPANISH.poi_fridge_desc_hackable: EL FRUTO ES ACTUALMENTE FRESCO Y OPERATIVO.
SPANISH.poi_fridge_desc_hacked: HAS SOBREVALORADO EL FIAMBRE Y LA COMIDA EN RUINAS.
SPANISH.poi_fridge_desc_inuse: UN TRABAJADOR ESTA BUSCANDO ESTE FUTURO.
SPANISH.poi_cooker_desc_hackable: EL GAS ESTA FLUYENDO ACTUALMENTE NORMAL.

SPANISH.poi_cooker_desc_being_fixed: EL SUMINISTRO DE GAS SE ESTA RECONECTANDO.
